itunes:title: The Monat Debate
title: The Monat Debate
description:
In the first episode of season 2, Jessi and Stew discuss a hot topic in the hair industry right now; Monat. Market Parters for this company have been pushing this product online for years, and there have been recent headlines about customer complaints and claims that have lead to legal battles. Jessi and Stew give their thoughts on it and also read other stylist's opinions they have gathered as well. 

FOLLOW US!

Instagram: @jzstyles.co

Jessi: @jz.styles, @justjessiiii

Stew: @stew.stylez
